primary.request: Inquire about Virginia resorts and RCI trading
primary.context: Caller wants to know if the company has resorts in Massanutten (mispronounced as Mass Nugget) or how to trade via RCI to get there.
primary.detail: The agent provided information on Virginia resort locations and sent an RCI help link via text for trading inquiries.

steps: Agent performs account lookup and verification.
Agent clarifies the caller's request regarding 'Mass Nugget' (Massanutten).
Agent provides names of available Virginia resorts and explains the distance to Massanutten.
Caller asks about trading via RCI and requests a human representative.
Agent offers and sends a link to the RCI help page via text.
Caller confirms receipt and ends the call satisfied.

actions.detail: Looked up account using phone number.
Verified name and state of residence.
Sent RCI help page link via text.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to stay at Massanutten; the agent correctly identified the location, explained it wasn't a Vacatia property, and provided an RCI link to facilitate a trade.
insights.verbatim: How can I maybe trade off with one of RCI or something that's right there?
